meanings.definition: Scientists who study tree rings to determine past climates and dates of events.
meanings.sent1: Dendrochronologists use tree rings to learn about old weather and historical dates.
meanings.sent2: The dendrochronologists published a paper on their findings about ancient climates.
meanings.sent3: The party was so boring that pretending to be dendrochronologists studying tree rings seemed more exciting.
meanings.sent4: Her memory worked like the tools of dendrochronologists, revealing hidden layers of the past.
meanings.sent5: The dendrochronologists' work was like reading a book written by trees, each ring a chapter of history.

meanings.definition: The study of tree rings to analyze environmental changes over time.
meanings.sent1: Studying tree rings is an important part of the work of dendrochronologists.
meanings.sent2: The dendrochronologists' research shed light on how the environment has changed through the years.
meanings.sent3: The comedy show featured a sketch about a group of comedians pretending to be dendrochronologists arguing over tree rings.
meanings.sent4: The passage of time was like a forest to the dendrochronologists, each tree ring a marker of change.
meanings.sent5: The classroom buzzed with excitement as the students learned about the fascinating work of dendrochronologists.
